Description:- Collecting the tweets using Twitter API and providing the feedback on each tweets after analyzing its emotion. Used Python,MongoDB and NLTK tools for this.

Automatic Content extraction and classification: Personalized News Application

Web scraping, Data mining & Classification
Description:- Now each seconds in this world is filled with news and information and hence it is becoming hard for the user to filter the contents with their taste, to address this we designed an Android app and an API, that provides category specific, location based and latest news available on the web, to the user. Also a website that do the same.
Guided by Asst. Prof.Afsar
year-2017 Automatic Content extraction and classification
